action-sfsblock-bypass: bypass blacklisted IP blocks issued by the StopForumSpam extension

right-sfsblock-bypass: Bypass blacklisted IP blocks issued by the StopForumSpam extension
right-stopforumspam: Submit data about blocked users to stopforumspam.com
